name: The Grand Escape of Dielucard
description:
Controls:

 - Movement: A and D, or left and right arrows.
 - Jump: W, up arrow or spacebar.
 - Attack: Left click or right control key.

2D platformer where you control Dielucard, a Dhampir Warrior. As a Dhampir, half-human and half-vampire, he has some special powers he isn't aware of. For this, his father, a powerful vampire, cages him and extracts his essence.

After being imprisoned for a very long time, he manages to escape and grab a sword, and now will slash his way to freedom.
